site_name: Parcel 4Erith QuarryFraser RoadErithKent
description: Application for partial approval with respect to Parcel 4, of Condition 18 (management/maintenance of estate roads) pursuant to planning permission 14/02155/OUTM for full planning permission for the provision of new site accesses and access roads, a 3-Form Entry Primary School (4,300 sqm GEA), 86 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) (up to a maximum of 8,926 sqm GIA) and an ecology/grassland area in Phase 1 with outline planning permission in 3 subsequent phases (with all matters reserved except for access) for up to a maximum of 540 sqm GEA of ancillary non-residential floorspace (Use Classes A1, A2, A3, B1 and / or D1) and up to a further 514 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) (up to a maximum of 64,505 sqm GIA) together with associated works including informal and formal open space; pedestrian and cyclist infrastructure; car and cycle parking.
